Title: Exempts the sanitation police of the department of sanitation of the city of New York from training requirements for security guards
Summary: Exempts the sanitation police of the department of sanitation of the city of New York from training requirements for security guards.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-n, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to exempting the sanitation police of the department of sanitation of the city of New York from training requirements for security guards
